attributes.action: Deploy British Forces to Zimbabwe in order to distribute food and medicines throughout Zimbabwe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The regime of Robert Mugabe continues to ignore the plight of common people and continues to flout the rule of law in every sense. The time has come for decent, caring leaders to show some backbone - stop the rhetoric and use some muscle against this tyrant. We demand real action on the ground NOW.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
